description.largeText:
Roblox is the ultimate virtual universe that lets you play, create and be anything you can imagine. Join millions of players and discover an infinite variety of immersive worlds created by a global community!

Get new accessories, emotes, and more for your avatar!

Roblox Digital Code Terms and Conditions

This code may only be redeemed at www.roblox.com for Robux, which may only be used to obtain certain products and services at www.roblox.com. Availability and pricing of products and services is subject to change and age restrictions may apply. To redeem this code and use Robux, you must have Internet access, register for a Roblox account and accept the Roblox Terms of Use. No partial redemption is permitted. This code is not redeemable for cash or credit, except as and where required by law. Resale is strictly prohibited. Roblox is not responsible if this code is used without your permission or if it is lost, stolen or forgotten. A code obtained by fraud will not be honoured. Only one virtual item is made available per account per month or such other period as Roblox may designate. For minimum system requirements and more information, please visit www.roblox.com or contact us at www.roblox.com/support.

parentPromotion.name: ENstar_pcparent_FY26_WSB_Dec_punchcard

attributes.classification.DescriptionText: Your built-in Windows Search gives you instant web results, finds the perfect image for your presentation, and more, all without breaking your flow. One search box. Endless possibilities. Plus you earn points for web searches. More points = more rewards. Punch card ends January 10, 2026 at 11:59:59 PT.
attributes.classification.TitleText: Get 100 points. Use the search box on the Windows taskbar to search the web, find files, more.
attributes.description: Find more than files. Get imagery, info, more, in a snap.
attributes.legal_text: *Windows 10 and Windows 11 PC experience only
attributes.title: Explore Windows Search
attributes.translationprompt: For the 'title' string: Translate to emphasize exploration and usefulness of Windows Search, keeping it short, clear, and inviting. For the 'description' string: Translate to highlight the multiple capabilities of Windows Search—finding apps, files, web results, images, and definitions—while maintaining a tone that is helpful and inspiring. For the 'link text' string: Translate as a clear and motivating call-to-action encouraging users to start the punch card now.

parentPromotion.title: Explore Windows Search
parentPromotion.description: Find more than files. Get imagery, info, more, in a snap.
parentPromotion.legalText: *Windows 10 and Windows 11 PC experience only

childPromotions.name: ENstar_pcchild1_urlreward_FY26_WSB_Dec_punchcard

attributes.description: Need presentation graphics? Looking for inspiration? Turn your ideas into stunning visuals with Bing Image Creator. It's fast, easy, and right from the search box on the Windows taskbar.
attributes.title: Your words become art in seconds
attributes.translationprompt: For the 'title' string: Translate to convey creativity and speed, emphasizing how quickly words turn into art, keeping tone culturally appropriate. For the 'description' string: Translate to highlight ease, inspiration, and the benefit of creating stunning visuals with Bing Image Creator directly from the Windows Search Box, maintaining a helpful and inviting tone. For the 'link text' string: Translate as a clear and motivating call-to-action encouraging users to try creating an image now.

childPromotions.title: Your words become art in seconds
childPromotions.description: Need presentation graphics? Looking for inspiration? Turn your ideas into stunning visuals with Bing Image Creator. It's fast, easy, and right from the search box on the Windows taskbar.

childPromotions.name: ENstar_pcchild2_urlreward_FY26_WSB_Dec_punchcard

attributes.description: In a meeting and hear a term you don’t know? Look it up fast, and discreetly, right from the search box on the Windows taskbar. And, you'll earn points for starting a web search, too.
attributes.title: No more head-scratching...
attributes.translationprompt: For the 'title' string: Translate to convey clarity and reassurance, emphasizing that users can quickly find definitions without confusion. For the 'description' string: Translate to highlight speed, discretion, and the benefit of looking up unfamiliar terms directly from the Windows Search Box, while also mentioning earning points for searches. Keep the tone helpful and professional. For the 'link text' string: Translate as a clear and motivating call-to-action encouraging users to define any word instantly.

childPromotions.title: No more head-scratching...
childPromotions.description: In a meeting and hear a term you don’t know? Look it up fast, and discreetly, right from the search box on the Windows taskbar. And, you'll earn points for starting a web search, too.

childPromotions.name: ENstar_pcchild3_urlreward_FY26_WSB_Dec_punchcard

attributes.description: Find a recipe instantly from the search box on the Windows taskbar. Quick, easy, and just what you need to keep mealtime stress-free. Plus, you'll earn points for your web searches.
attributes.title: Dinner in a dash
attributes.translationprompt: For the 'title' string: Translate to convey speed and convenience, emphasizing that users can quickly find dinner ideas without stress. For the 'description' string: Translate to highlight ease, quick access to recipes from the Windows Search Box, and the added benefit of earning points for searches. Keep the tone friendly and helpful. For the 'link text' string: Translate as a clear and motivating call-to-action encouraging users to find recipes instantly.

childPromotions.title: Dinner in a dash
childPromotions.description: Find a recipe instantly from the search box on the Windows taskbar. Quick, easy, and just what you need to keep mealtime stress-free. Plus, you'll earn points for your web searches.

childPromotions.name: ENstar_pcchild4_urlreward_FY26_WSB_Dec_punchcard

attributes.description: Windows Search makes grabbing documents and apps effortless. Need the calculator? Type and go. Can’t recall a file name? Type what you remember directly into the search box.
attributes.title: From files to apps, just type and done
attributes.translationprompt: For the 'title' string: Translate to emphasize simplicity and speed, highlighting that users can quickly access files and apps by typing in the Windows Search Box. For the 'description' string: Translate to convey ease and convenience when finding documents or apps, including examples like using the calculator or recalling a file name. Keep the tone practical and helpful. For the 'link text' string: Translate as a clear and motivating call-to-action encouraging users to try the calculator now.

childPromotions.title: From files to apps, just type and done
childPromotions.description: Windows Search makes grabbing documents and apps effortless. Need the calculator? Type and go. Can’t recall a file name? Type what you remember directly into the search box.

description.largeText:
Roblox is the ultimate virtual universe that lets you play, create and be anything you can imagine. Join millions of players and discover an infinite variety of immersive worlds created by a global community!

Get new accessories, emotes, and more for your avatar!

Roblox Digital Code Terms and Conditions

This code may only be redeemed at www.roblox.com for Robux, which may only be used to obtain certain products and services at www.roblox.com. Availability and pricing of products and services is subject to change and age restrictions may apply. To redeem this code and use Robux, you must have Internet access, register for a Roblox account and accept the Roblox Terms of Use. No partial redemption is permitted. This code is not redeemable for cash or credit, except as and where required by law. Resale is strictly prohibited. Roblox is not responsible if this code is used without your permission or if it is lost, stolen or forgotten. A code obtained by fraud will not be honoured. Only one virtual item is made available per account per month or such other period as Roblox may designate. For minimum system requirements and more information, please visit www.roblox.com or contact us at www.roblox.com/support.

description.largeText: Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading Online to Offline (O2O) mobile platform. Grab is the region’s everyday super app that provides services that matter the most to consumers. Through its open platform strategy, Grab works with partners to provide safe, accessible and affordable transport, food, package, grocery, delivery, mobile payments and financial services of Southeast Asians.
description.showcaseDescription: Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading Online to Offline (O2O) mobile platform.

description.largeText:
Roblox is the ultimate virtual universe that lets you play, create and be anything you can imagine. Join millions of players and discover an infinite variety of immersive worlds created by a global community!

Get new accessories, emotes, and more for your avatar!

Roblox Digital Code Terms and Conditions

This code may only be redeemed at www.roblox.com for Robux, which may only be used to obtain certain products and services at www.roblox.com. Availability and pricing of products and services is subject to change and age restrictions may apply. To redeem this code and use Robux, you must have Internet access, register for a Roblox account and accept the Roblox Terms of Use. No partial redemption is permitted. This code is not redeemable for cash or credit, except as and where required by law. Resale is strictly prohibited. Roblox is not responsible if this code is used without your permission or if it is lost, stolen or forgotten. A code obtained by fraud will not be honoured. Only one virtual item is made available per account per month or such other period as Roblox may designate. For minimum system requirements and more information, please visit www.roblox.com or contact us at www.roblox.com/support.

description.largeText:
Overwatch 2 is a free-to-play, team-based action game set in the optimistic future, where every match is the ultimate 5v5 battlefield brawl. Play as a time-jumping freedom fighter, a beat-dropping battlefield DJ, or one of over 30 other unique heroes as you battle it out around the globe.

With your Overwatch Coins, you can buy the Premium Battle Pass and in-game cosmetics items to customize your heroes. Owners of the Premium Battle Pass can also use Overwatch Coins to unlock Tiers and instantly access Legendary and Mythic content.

Overwatch Coins Digital Code Terms and Conditions

Standard terms and conditions for the Battle.net and Overwatch 2 apply for the redemption of codes and use of Coins, including a Battle.net account in good standing that has access to the game, Internet Connection and a platform to play the game that meets the minimum system requirements for Overwatch 2.
description.showcaseTitle: Overwatch Coins are now available for redemption
description.showcaseDescription: For a limited time get 200 Overwatch Coins for only 1800 points!

catalogItems.title: Sea of Thieves: Ancient Coin Pack

description.largeText:
The Sea of Thieves Pirate Emporium holds a hoard of delights for pirates looking to make their mark on the waves, from ship and weapon sets to perky pets and costumes to transform your pirate. Ancient Coins can be spent in the Pirate Emporium in exchange for these treasures and much more.

Purchase packs of Ancient Coins to spend in Sea of Thieves’ in-game Pirate Emporium. Use them to acquire premium cosmetic items such as ship sets, weapons, clothing and pets, or splash out on the latest Season’s Plunder Pass! Whether you’re seeking an animal sidekick, a classy costume for your pirate or an imposing figurehead for your mighty vessel, pay a visit to the Pirate Emporium within Sea of Thieves and see what your Ancient Coins could get you.

Sea of Thieves: Ancient Coin Pack Terms and Conditions

You must accept the Microsoft Services Agreement (microsoft.com/msa). Requires download(s) (significant storage, broadband internet connection and ISP fees apply). May require additional hardware and subscriptions. Features, services and support not available in all regions (xbox.com/regions), and may vary, change or be retired over time. May contain in-game purchases. Microsoft Account required. Requires Sea of Thieves game, and on console Xbox Game Pass Ultimate or Xbox Game Pass Core (all sold separately). Except as required by law, codes are non-refundable.
description.showcaseTitle: Sea of Thieves: Ancient Coin Pack
description.showcaseDescription: Sea of Thieves offers the essential pirate experience – everything you need to live the pirate life and carve your own legends across the sea.

description.largeText: Supermarket chain that has many branches in Indonesia. The outlets generally sell a variety of food, beverage and other living necessities. More than 200 food products and other living necessities are available at competitive prices, to fulfill the daily needs of consumers.

description.largeText: Grab is Southeast Asia’s leading Online to Offline (O2O) mobile platform. Grab is the region’s everyday super app that provides services that matter the most to consumers. Through its open platform strategy, Grab works with partners to provide safe, accessible and affordable transport, food, package, grocery, delivery, mobile payments and financial services of Southeast Asians.

description.largeText:
Every child has the right to an education. In over 140 countries around the world, UNICEF works tirelessly to ensure children and adolescents have the knowledge and skills they need to thrive. The Learning Passport, developed by UNICEF, Generation Unlimited, and partners, ensures that children and young people can continue their education and learn skills from anywhere, at anytime. This digital learning solution was rapidly rolled out in 2020 to support the 1.8 billion students impacted by COVID-19 school closures, using technology to address challenges faced by learners, facilitators and education providers. To date, the Learning Passport has helped 560,000 students, teachers, and caregivers in 11 countries continue their education and learn skills needed to reach their full potential.

UNICEF USA and UNICEF do not endorse any company, brand, product or service. Donations will be distributed to non-profits roughly six weeks after the month end of when the points were donated. Contributions to nonprofit organizations that are undeliverable will be given to a nonprofit of Microsoft’s choosing on your behalf. This could happen if the nonprofit no longer meets the participation criteria.
description.showcaseDescription: UNICEF works in the world’s toughest places to reach the most disadvantaged children and adolescents – and to protect the rights of every child, everywhere.

catalogItems.title: Donate to the International Rescue Committee

description.largeText:
Help the IRC provide critical aid to displaced families in countries like Ukraine, Afghanistan, Syria, and Yemen. When you donate Microsoft Rewards points to the IRC, you're supporting humanitarian efforts around the world. 

The International Rescue Committee (IRC) helps people affected by humanitarian crises to survive, recover and rebuild their lives. We deliver lasting impact by providing health care, helping children learn, and empowering individuals and communities to become self-reliant, always with a focus on the unique needs of women and girls. Founded in 1933 at the call of Albert Einstein, we now work in over 40 crisis-affected countries as well as communities throughout Europe and the Americas.

Learn more at www.rescue.org and follow the IRC on Twitter & Facebook.

Learn more at www.rescue.org and follow the IRC on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, or LinkedIn. 

Donations will be distributed to non-profits roughly six weeks after the month end of when the points were donated. Contributions to nonprofit organizations that are undeliverable will be given to a nonprofit of Microsoft’s choosing on your behalf. This could happen if the nonprofit no longer meets the participation criteria.
description.showcaseTitle: Donate to the International Rescue Committee
description.showcaseDescription: Help the IRC provide critical aid to displaced families in countries like Ukraine, Afghanistan, Syria, and Yemen.

description.largeText:
Save the Children believes every child deserves a future.

Since our founding over 100 years ago, we’ve changed the lives of over 1 billion children. Around the world, we give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm. We do whatever it takes for children – every day and in times of crisis – transforming their lives and the future we share.

Donations will be distributed to non-profits roughly six weeks after the month end of when the points were donated. Contributions to nonprofit organisations that are undeliverable will be given to a nonprofit of Microsoft’s choosing on your behalf. This could happen if the nonprofit no longer meets the participation criteria.
description.showcaseDescription: Save the Children believes every child deserves a future.

description.largeText:
Founded in 1945 with the creation of the CARE Package®, CARE is a leading humanitarian organization fighting global poverty. CARE places special focus on working alongside girls and women because, equipped with the proper resources, they have the power to lift whole families and entire communities out of poverty. In 2021, CARE worked in 102 countries, reaching more than 100 million people through more than 1,400 programs. We celebrated our 75th anniversary and continued our Fast and Fair initiative, providing COVID-19 vaccine delivery to at least 100 million people.

CARE is responding to the enormous regressions around poverty and hunger – providing clean water, hygiene kits, nutritious food and income to millions of people who face the threat of malnutrition due to lockdowns or loss of income. CARE has expanded an innovative accelerated learning program for out-of-school adolescents helping more than 3 million students gain relevant skills. And, CARE has been responding to more than 44 urgent crises including Afghanistan, Haiti, Syria, and Ukraine. We are particularly concerned about the growing hunger crisis, and are launching a major campaign in the fall of 2022 to raise funds and awareness, with opportunities for individuals to join us on this impact journey as we seek a more equitable future for all.

To learn more, visit www.care.org

Donations will be distributed to non-profits roughly six weeks after the month end of when the points were donated. Contributions to nonprofit organisations that are undeliverable will be given to a nonprofit of Microsoft’s choosing on your behalf. This could happen if the nonprofit no longer meets the participation criteria.
description.showcaseDescription: CARE is a leading humanitarian organization fighting global poverty.

description.legalText: Microsoft partners with Benevity to facilitate its donations. Your points redemption activity will be deducted from your account immediately. Within six weeks after the end of the month in which you redeem your points, Microsoft will make a cash donation based on your redemption to a donor-advised fund at the Benevity UK Online Giving Foundation (OGF), with a recommendation that they make a corresponding grant to your selected nonprofit organization. OGF will take exclusive legal control of Microsoft's donation on your behalf. Donation redemptions are non-refundable. If your chosen nonprofit is not able to receive the donation (for example, if it no longer meets the participation criteria), or if the donation is otherwise undeliverable, the cash donation will be redirected to a nonprofit of Microsoft's choosing. Non-profits are not endorsed by Microsoft.
